results.title: Splash [Italian version]
results.brief_description: A home swimming pool, an accidental drowning, a distraught helpless mother. Such tragedies can be prevented. A poolside seminar demonstrates the dangers and the means of avoiding them, emphasising the need for awareness and the knowledge of basic methods of resuscitation. In Italian language only.

results.title: Spaced: the Roundhouse, London, 1969
results.creator_credit: Peter Theobald, Arts Council of Great Britain and Intergalactic Films
results.brief_description: A performance at the Roundhouse, London, by gymnasts, kendo fighters, painters, sculptors, hand balancers and acrobats, showing the structure, costumes and illustrating the use of the materials, lighting and effects.

results.title: Southern Rhodesia: climate and cultivation
results.brief_description: Shows the effect of climate and altitude on the agriculture of Southern Rhodesia. The difference between Low Veld native subsistence farming and High Veld commercial farming. Maps indicate varying altitude and seasonal rainfall which make possible the growing of maize, cotton, tobacco, fruit and barley.

results.title: South Canterbury
results.creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit and Soil Conservation and Rivers Control Council
results.brief_description: Shows problems of floods, and soil erosion in one catchment area. Explains how public authorities brought the rivers under control, and took measures for soil conservation.

results.title: South America today
results.creator_credit: Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
results.brief_description: An introduction to the wide variety of people and topography to be found in South America. Depicts the Trans-Amazon highway across Brazil, a new steel mill on the Orinoco River, a university in Quito, a peaceful political rally in Santiago, the oldest airline in the Western Hemisphere, a strife-filled street demonstration, old paintings and modern graphics. Features three traditional institutions: the hacienda, the church and the military.

results.title: South Africa: the white laager
results.creator_credit: Peter F. Davis, Barry Callaghan, Sveriges radio aktiebolag, United Nations Television, Villon Films and WGBH (Boston)
results.brief_description: A documentary which explores the history of the Afrikaaners and Afrikaaner nationalism, and the development of apartheid and its relevance to South Africa’s political situation today. Includes interviews with whites in various professions and with differing points of view on apartheid.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter F. Davis, Barry Callaghan, Sveriges radio aktiebolag, United Nations Television, Villon Films and WGBH (Boston)

results.title: Sound recording and reproduction
results.brief_description: Describes how sound is converted into light rays to produce optical sound motion pictures, and how the projector is able to change the light rays back into sound waves. Also describes sound recording by variable density.

results.title: Sound off
results.creator_credit: Sandy Spillman, David Adams and Pyramid Films

results.title: Song of the paddle
results.creator_credit: Bill Mason, Bill Brand, Marrin Canell and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Outdoorsman Bill Mason takes his wife and two children on a wilderness canoe camping holiday. In this film the art of canoeing is more than technical expertise; it becomes a family experience of shared joy. Along the way there are countless adventures and much lovely scenery, including the Indian rock carvings of Lake Superior
